reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: An extreme close-up shot focused on the environment texture, which appears warped and digitally disrupted, suggesting an ongoing chaotic event. No distinct characters are fully visible, the frame is dominated by abstract, glitching visuals and the momentary appearance of what looks like a CGI medieval KNIGHT captured mid-swing with a sword.
text_prompt:

The environment texture has returned to a stable state, though perhaps subtly altered, with no visible sword-wielding entity or triangular fragments remaining.
